basics.name: Sean Teramae
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2019.

work.summary: Front-end engineer for Hearthstone and Diablo franchise websites
highlights: Collaborated with other engineers as a front-end engineer for the Diablo and Hearthstone franchise websites.
Responsible for creating new (and improving existing) applications in a high-load, high-availability environment. Heavy focus on front-end web development with cohesive server-side integration.

Extensive use of industry standard technologies such as React and Node.js to develop premium web experiences that drive online sales. Development work includes promotional Diablo Necromancer material and a redesigned Hearthstone eSports page.

work.company: University of Hawai'i at Manoa, College of Engineering
highlights: Corrected and provided critique on Digital Design homework for forty students.
Arranged with instructor to provide sufficient feedback for students on a bi-weekly basis.
Managed clientsâ€™ websites using popular CMS software (Wordpress/Joomla) to facilitate online marketing.
Optimized automated script in Node.js for archiving legacy data in preparation for server migrations.
Implemented open-source scheduling software for company-wide use to replace previous scheduling system. Enhanced office efficiency by visualizing available resources and rooms at a glance.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
